roleset.name: earn points (in athletic competition), awarding/earning points

role.descr: grader, judge, entity awarding the points

example.name: score-v: tor!
example.text: John 's soccer team scored 115 points against the neighborhood kids .

example.name: score-v: with Arg0, may be rare with the verb
example.text: no , so how they score you is largely irrelevant , you are probably getting a " low " score simply because you do not have much credit , and so can not prove that you are a good risk .

example.name: scoring-n: Args 0, 1, 2
example.text: We do n't believe he pitched his questions next day in an easier key , nor that his memory of the " concord of sweet sounds " was any bar to his pedagogical puncturing ; and as for his scoring them any the less on account of their performance , we do n't believe a word of it .

example.name: scoring-n: args 1, 2, 3
example.text: All that practice resulted in his scoring a perfect game in his league competition which?combined with two other strong games of 225 and 216?gave him a 741 series .

propbank.arg: which?combined with two other strong games of 225 and 216?gave him a 741 series

example.name: score-n: most args
example.text: His score of 4 on Question 7a indicated a total loss of interest in ...

example.name: score-n: just arg1
example.text: the Chinese team defeated the relatively stronger Korean team with a score of 4 : 3 .

example.name: score-n: arg2
example.text: students in charter schools have lower performance scores than students in traditional public schools .

roleset.note: SCORE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls get-13.5.1. (from score.01-v)
SCORING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, partially on score-n.01. Corresponds to VNcls get-13.5.1. (from scoring.01-n)
SCORE-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on score-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls get-13.5.1. (from score.01-n)

roleset.name: set music, orchestrate

example.name: score-v: unhelpful passive
example.text: Also , Teodulo Mabellini 's `` Lux aeterna '' was intriguingly scored and splendidly put across by Mr. Rilling .

example.name: score-v: all args
example.text: John scored his magnum opus for slide whistle and kazoo choir .

propbank.arg: for slide whistle and kazoo choir

roleset.note: SCORE-V NOTES: No appropriate Vncls. (from score.02-v)
